Our Product

Here at Olive2Oil we pride ourselves on quality, thats why our oil has never been anying short of a silver medal. We wouldn't want to sell it to you otherwise. Quality makes all the difference, once you try our oil you wont be able to go back to supermarket brands.

Try it yourself

About us

Olive2oil is a premium, award winning Extra Virgin Olive Oil (EVOO). It is produced by the careful blending of oil from the olives from several varieties of olive tress.The trees are predominately of the Italian origin and grown in the fertile soils of Tauherenikau in the Southern Wairarapa. Olive2oil carries the Olives New Zealand OliveMark certifying that it meets the bottling, labeling, chemical and sensory criteria of EVOO. These criteria are based on international Olive Council standards for EVOO.

Get our oil

There are various places around the wellington region where you can pick up our Extra virgin olive oil off the shelf or if you'd prefure you can ordered it straight from us via this hand form below. Just fill in all the fields and we'll get in touch with the payment details.
